file.name: example-openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: Sample Vehicle API
  description: This is an example API to showcase the translation from OpenAPI to PlantUML.
  version: 0.0.1


paths:
  /vehicles/air:
    description: Air vehicles
    get:
      summary: Returns a list of vehicles.
      description: Returns a list of vehicles.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: An JSON array of vehicles
          content:
            'application/json':
              schema:
                type: array
                minItems: 0
                items:
                  $ref: 'vehicle.yaml#/components/schemas/airVehicle'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /vehicles/air: get: responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: item: parse schema: resolve "vehicle.yaml#/components/schemas/airVehicle": external "vehicle.yaml": file: local file reference is not allowed
